trans-unit.source: Represents a panel that dynamically lays out its contents in a grid composed of rows and columns.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control arranges its contents in a grid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 控制項會在格線中排列其內容。

trans-unit.source: Because the layout is performed both at design time and run time, it can change dynamically as the application environment changes.
trans-unit.target: 由於配置會在設計階段和執行階段執行，因此當應用程式環境變更時，配置也會隨著動態變更。

trans-unit.source: This gives the controls in the panel the ability to proportionally resize, so it can respond to changes such as the parent control resizing or text length changing due to localization.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓面板中的控制項按比例調整大小，以便回應變更 (例如，由於當地語系化所造成的父控制項調整大小或文字長度變更)。

trans-unit.source: Any Windows Forms control can be a child of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control, including other instances of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 任何 Windows Form 控制項都可以是 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 控制項的子系，包括 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 的其他執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to construct sophisticated layouts that adapt to changes at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這樣您就可以建構複雜的配置，以調整為在執行階段變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control can expand to accommodate new controls when they are added, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 根據 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> 屬性的值，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 控制項可以展開，以在新控制項加入時加以容納。

trans-unit.source: Setting either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> property to a value of 0 specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> will be unbound in the corresponding direction.
trans-unit.target: 將 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> 或 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> 屬性設定為值 0，可指定對應方向的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 將解除繫結。

trans-unit.source: You can also control the direction of expansion (horizontal or vertical) after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control is full of child controls.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 控制項已完全充滿子控制項之後，控制展開的方向 (水平或垂直)。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control expands downward by adding rows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 控制項預設會向下加入資料列來展開。

trans-unit.source: If you want rows and columns that behave differently from the default behavior, you can control the properties of rows and columns by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望資料列和資料行的行為不同於預設的行為，就可以使用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A> 屬性來控制資料列和資料行的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can set the properties of rows or columns individually.
trans-unit.target: 您可以個別設定資料列或資料行的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control adds the following properties to its child controls: `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 控制項會將下列屬性加入其子控制項：`Cell`、`Column`、`Row`、`ColumnSpan` 和 `RowSpan`。

trans-unit.source: You can merge cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control by setting the `ColumnSpan` or `RowSpan` properties on a child control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定子控制項的 `ColumnSpan` 或 `RowSpan` 屬性，來合併 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 控制項中的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: To set the `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan` properties at run time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetCellPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定`Cell`， `Column`， `Row`， `ColumnSpan`，和`RowSpan`屬性在執行階段，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetCellPosition%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRow%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To read the `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan` properties at run time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetCellPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 讀取`Cell`， `Column`， `Row`， `ColumnSpan`，和`RowSpan`屬性在執行階段，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetCellPosition%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The docking behavior of child controls is the same as other container controls.
trans-unit.target: 子控制項的停駐行為等同於其他容器控制項。

trans-unit.source: The anchoring behavior of child controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> differs from the behavior in other container controls.
trans-unit.target: 中的子控制項的錨定行為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>不同於其他容器控制項中的行為。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the child control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Left> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Right>, the control will be placed against the left or right border of the cell, at a distance that is the sum of the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> property and the panel's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果子控制項的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Left>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Right>、 將控制項放置針對儲存格左或向右框線的距離，這是控制項的總和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A>屬性和面板的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Left> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Right> values are set, the control will be sized to the width of the cell, with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> values taken into account.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Left>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Right>設定值，控制項將會調整成儲存格的寬度與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>列入考量的值。

trans-unit.source: The behavior for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Top> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Bottom> anchoring is analogous.
trans-unit.target: 行為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Top>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Bottom>錨定是類似。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Anchor and Dock Child Controls in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-anchor-and-dock-child-controls-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 錨定和停駐 TableLayoutPanel 控制項中的子控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-anchor-and-dock-child-controls-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you need a child control to mimic the default anchoring behavior in other container controls, you can adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> properties to maintain a constant distance between the control's border and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要模擬預設錨定行為，在其他容器控制項的子控制項，您可以調整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>屬性，以維護控制項的框線與儲存格的框線之間的固定距離。

trans-unit.source: Setting the values of both the `Column` and `Row` properties of a child control to -1 will cause the control to be moved to the first empty cell in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定兩個值`Column`和`Row`為-1 的子控制項的屬性會導致控制項移到中的第一個空白儲存格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The empty cell will be chosen in a search that proceeds from left to right and from top to bottom.
trans-unit.target: 將進行的搜尋中選擇的空資料格，從左到右，從上到下。

trans-unit.source: This order is dependent on the culture, so it will behave correctly in right-to-left (RTL) layouts.
trans-unit.target: 此順序是文化特性，而定，因此正確運作中由右至左 (RTL) 配置。

trans-unit.source: Only controls that have the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property set to `true` participate in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control's layout computations.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的控制項有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>屬性設定為`true`參與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控制項的版面配置計算。

trans-unit.source: Also see:
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱：

trans-unit.source: [How to: Align and Stretch a Control in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-align-and-stretch-a-control-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)
trans-unit.target: [操作說明：在 TableLayoutPanel 控制項中對齊和縮放控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-align-and-stretch-a-control-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)

trans-unit.source: [How to: Span Rows and Columns in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-span-rows-and-columns-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)
trans-unit.target: [操作說明：擴展 TableLayoutPanel 控制項中的資料列和資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-span-rows-and-columns-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)

trans-unit.source: [How to: Edit Columns and Rows in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-edit-columns-and-rows-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)
trans-unit.target: [操作說明：編輯 TableLayoutPanel 控制項中的資料行和資料列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-edit-columns-and-rows-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)

trans-unit.source: [Walkthrough: Arranging Controls on Windows Forms Using a TableLayoutPanel](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-arranging-controls-on-windows-forms-using-a-tablelayoutpanel.md)
trans-unit.target: [逐步解說：使用 TableLayoutPanel 排列 Windows Forms 上的控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-arranging-controls-on-windows-forms-using-a-tablelayoutpanel.md)

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.OnCellPaint%2A> method to create a custom appearance for a cell.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.OnCellPaint%2A>方法來建立自訂資料格的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> class.

This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.BorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>成為其預設值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for the panel.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values describing the style of the border of the panel.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" />描述面板的框線樣式的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the cell borders.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellBorderStyle" /> values describing the style of all the cell borders in the table.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellBorderStyle" />描述的資料表中的所有資料格框線樣式的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellBorderStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellBorderStyle.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting this value will cause the panel to redraw itself and its contents.
trans-unit.target: 將這個值會導致重繪本身以及其內容的面板。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.BorderStyle%2A> property depending on the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.BorderStyle%2A>根據所選屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cell is redrawn.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.CellPaint> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.CellPaint>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> named `TableLayoutPanel1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>名為`TableLayoutPanel1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.CellPaint> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.CellPaint>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns in the table.
The number of columns in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的資料行數目<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: You can specify both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> properties for layouts with a known and fixed number of cells.
trans-unit.target: 您可以同時指定兩者<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>已知且固定數目的資料格的版面配置的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify one property or the other if you expect the number of cells in your layout to grow, assuming that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property allows for such growth.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定一個屬性或其他如果您預期的資料格數目成長時，讓版面配置中假設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>屬性可讓這類的成長。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> is 0, the panel will grow by adding rows, and if the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> is 0, the panel will grow by adding columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>是 0，將會成長面板加入資料列，而且如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>是 0，將會成長面板加入資料行。

trans-unit.source: Specifying panel growth with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property is preferred to setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> to 0, however.
trans-unit.target: 指定與面板成長<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>屬性應優先於設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>為 0，不過。

trans-unit.source: Controls can be added or deleted from the table using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 控制項可以加入或刪除資料表使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of column styles for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" /> containing a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> for each column in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />包含<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" />每個資料行中<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A> property to access the style properties of specific columns.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A>屬性來存取特定資料行的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> class to set the characteristics of individual columns in the table.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>類別來設定資料表中的個別資料行的特性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control arranges its columns, it assigns priorities to each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控制項會排列其資料行，它會將優先順序指派給每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>順序如下：

trans-unit.source: Columns with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Absolute> are considered first, and their fixed widths are allocated.
trans-unit.target: 具有資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Absolute>會被視為已配置，然後其固定的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Columns with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize> are sized to their contents.
trans-unit.target: 具有資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize>的大小，以其內容。

trans-unit.source: Remaining space is divided among columns with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Percent>.
trans-unit.target: 剩餘的空間資料行之間分割<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Percent>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> properties of each column when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle>每個資料行的屬性時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>按下。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of controls contained within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection" /> containing the controls associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection" />包含目前與相關聯的控制項<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property contains all of the controls associated with the table, including controls that may not be currently displayed because of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> limitations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>屬性包含所有資料表，包括目前的顯示可能會因為的控制項相關聯的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>限制。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates all the child controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列舉中的所有子控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the control collection for the control.
A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> assigned to the control.
A control contained within a cell.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the row and the column of the cell.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the cell position.
A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
Returns the column position of the specified child control.
The column position of the specified child control, or -1 if the position of <paramref name="control" /> is determined by <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine" />.
If `control` spans two or more columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A> method will return the lowest column index.
trans-unit.target: 如果`control`跨越兩個或多個資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A>方法會傳回最低的資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: The column position value is zero based, so you can use it as an index for the array returned by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnWidths%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 資料行位置值是以零為起始，因此您可以使用它做為索引所傳回之陣列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnWidths%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `Column` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫`Column`面板在設計階段加入它的子控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To get the actual position of `control`, even when its position is determined by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的實際位置`control`，即使它的位置由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates all the child controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> and finds the column index for each control using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列舉中的所有子控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>，並為每個控制項中尋找的資料行索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="control" /> is not a type that can be arranged by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" />.
A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
Returns the number of columns spanned by the specified child control.
The number of columns spanned by the child control.
The default is 1.
Column spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably wider than its peers.
trans-unit.target: 跨越資料行通常很有用，大幅超過它的對等控制項的定位。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `ColumnSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫`ColumnSpan`面板在設計階段加入它的子控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A> methods to set the width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A>方法來設定寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array representing the widths, in pixels, of the columns in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
An array of type <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that contains the widths, in pixels, of the columns in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
The column position of the control to retrieve.
The row position of the control to retrieve.
Returns the child control occupying the specified position.

The child control occupying the specified cell; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if no control exists at the specified column and row, or if the control has its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible" /> property set to <see langword="false" />.
The column and row position values are zero based.
trans-unit.target: 資料行和資料列的位置值是以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates all the cell positions in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> by looping through the columns and rows given by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>, and then calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetControlFromPosition%2A> method to retrieve the control at each cell.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列舉中的所有儲存格位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>迴圈的資料行和資料列所指定來<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>，然後呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetControlFromPosition%2A>方法來擷取在每個資料格的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Either <paramref name="column" /> or <paramref name="row" /> (or both) is less than 0.
A control contained within a cell.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the row and the column of the cell that contains the control.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the cell position.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A> method returns the actual current position of `control`, even if its position is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A>方法會傳回實際的目前位置的`control`，即使它的位置由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method takes into account the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control state, including column or row spanning and when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A> has placed a control with its `Column` and `Row` properties set to -1.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會考量整個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控制項狀態，包括資料行或資料列擴展及何時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>有與控制項置於其`Column`和`Row`屬性設為-1。

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to the situation in which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A> return -1.
trans-unit.target: 這相當於情況<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A>傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
Returns the row position of the specified child control.
The row position of <paramref name="control" />, or -1 if the position of <paramref name="control" /> is determined by <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine" />.
If `control` spans two or more rows, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A> method will return the lowest row index.
trans-unit.target: 如果`control`跨越兩個或多個資料列，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A>方法會傳回最低的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The row position value is zero based, so you can use it as an index for the array returned by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowHeights%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 資料列位置值是以零為起始，因此您可以使用它做為索引所傳回之陣列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowHeights%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `Row` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫`Row`面板在設計階段加入它的子控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To get the actual position of `control`, even when its position is determined by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的實際位置`control`，即使它的位置由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates all the child controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> and finds the row index for each using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列舉中的所有子控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>並為每個找到的資料列索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="control" /> is not a type that can be arranged by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" />.
Returns an array representing the heights, in pixels, of the rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
An array of type <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that contains the heights, in pixels, of the rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
Returns the number of rows spanned by the specified child control.
The number of rows spanned by the child control.
The default is 1.
Row spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably taller than its peers.
trans-unit.target: 跨越資料列通常很有用，遠高於其對等控制項的定位。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `RowSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫`RowSpan`面板在設計階段加入它的子控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A> methods to set the width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A>方法來設定寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control should expand to accommodate new cells when all existing cells are occupied.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle" /> indicating the growth scheme.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle" />指出成長配置。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.AddRows" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.AddRows" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control expands downward by adding rows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 控制項預設會向下加入資料列來展開。

trans-unit.source: If an attempt is made to add a control to a full <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control, and the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.FixedSize>, then an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果嘗試將控制項加入完整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控制項，以及值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.FixedSize>，則<xref:System.ArgumentException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property depending on the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>根據所選屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>。

trans-unit.source: At run time, when the user clicks on the button labeled **Test GrowStyle**, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 在執行的階段，當使用者按一下按鈕**測試 GrowStyle**、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制項加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control is full, it expands by adding a row or column, or it raises an exception, depending on the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控制項已滿、 其加入資料列或資料行，來展開或便會產生例外狀況，根據的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The property value is invalid for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle" /> enumeration.
Gets a cached instance of the panel's layout engine.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> for the panel's contents.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" />面板的內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value representing the table layout settings.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings" /> containing the table layout settings.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings" />包含資料表配置設定。

trans-unit.source: The property value is <see langword="null" />, or an attempt was made to set <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings" /> directly, which is not supported; instead, set individual properties.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutCellPaintEventArgs" /> that provides data for the event.
Receives a call when the cell should be refreshed.
The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.OnCellPaint%2A> method to create a custom appearance for a cell.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.OnCellPaint%2A>方法來建立自訂資料格的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains information about the panel to paint.
Paints the background of the panel.
Gets or sets the number of rows in the table.
The number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的資料列數目<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: You can specify both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> properties for layouts with a known and fixed number of cells.
trans-unit.target: 您可以同時指定兩者<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>已知且固定數目的資料格的版面配置的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify one property or the other if you expect the number of cells in your layout to grow, assuming that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property allows for such growth.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定一個屬性或其他如果您預期的資料格數目成長時，讓版面配置中假設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>屬性可讓這類的成長。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> is 0, the panel will grow by adding rows, and if the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> is 0, the panel will grow by adding columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>是 0，將會成長面板加入資料列，而且如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>是 0，將會成長面板加入資料行。

trans-unit.source: Specifying panel growth with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property is preferred to setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> to 0, however.
trans-unit.target: 指定與面板成長<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>屬性應優先於設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>為 0，不過。

trans-unit.source: Controls can be added or deleted from the table using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 控制項可以加入或刪除資料表使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of row styles for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" /> containing a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> for each row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" />包含<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" />每個資料列<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A> property to access the style properties of specific rows.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A>屬性來存取特定資料列的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> class to set the characteristics of individual rows in the table.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>類別來設定資料表中的個別資料列的特性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control arranges its rows, it assigns priorities to each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控制項會排列其資料列，它會將優先順序指派給每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>順序如下：

trans-unit.source: Rows with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Absolute> are considered first, and their fixed heights are allocated.
trans-unit.target: 資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Absolute>會被視為已配置，然後其固定的高度。

trans-unit.source: Rows with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize> are sized to their contents.
trans-unit.target: 資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize>的大小，以其內容。

trans-unit.source: Remaining space is divided among rows with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Percent>.
trans-unit.target: 剩餘的空間之間的資料列分割<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Percent>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> properties of each row when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle>屬性每個資料列時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>按下。

trans-unit.source: The height and width of the control's bounds.
One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
The ratio by which to scale the control horizontally.
The ratio by which to scale the control vertically
Performs the work of scaling the entire panel and any child controls.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ScaleCore%2A> method uses the `dx` and `dy` parameter values to scale both the height and width of the panel independently.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ScaleCore%2A>方法會使用`dx`和`dy`分別調整高度和寬度面板的參數值。

trans-unit.source: A control contained within a cell.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the row and the column of the cell.
Sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the row and the column of the cell.
The control to move to another column.
The column to which <c>control</c> will be moved.
Sets the column position of the specified child control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A> method moves the control to another column in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A>方法會將控制項移到另一個資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。

trans-unit.source: The columns and rows have zero-based indexes.
trans-unit.target: 資料行和資料列的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Setting the column position to -1 specifies that the control will flow to the first empty cell.
trans-unit.target: 將資料行位置設定為-1 指定控制項將會流至第一個空白資料格。

trans-unit.source: This method reapplies the table layout to all controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法重新套用至所有控制項中的資料表配置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `Column` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫`Column`面板在設計階段加入它的子控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A> method to swap two controls contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A>方法來交換兩個控制項內含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control with at least two rows.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>至少兩個資料列的控制。

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
The number of columns to span.
Sets the number of columns spanned by the child control.
Column spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably wider than its peers.
trans-unit.target: 跨越資料行通常很有用，大幅超過它的對等控制項的定位。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `ColumnSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫`ColumnSpan`面板在設計階段加入它的子控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A> methods to set the width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A>方法來設定寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is less than 1.
The control to move to another row.
The row to which <c>control</c> will be moved.
Sets the row position of the specified child control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRow%2A> method moves the control to another row in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRow%2A>方法會將控制項移到另一個資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The columns and rows have zero-based indexes.
trans-unit.target: 資料行和資料列的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Setting the row position to -1 specifies that the control will flow to the first empty cell.
trans-unit.target: 將資料列位置設定為-1 指定控制項將會流至第一個空白資料格。

trans-unit.source: This method reapplies the table layout to all controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法重新套用至所有控制項中的資料表配置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `Row` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫`Row`面板在設計階段加入它的子控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A> method to swap two controls contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A>方法來交換兩個控制項內含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control with at least two rows.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>至少兩個資料列的控制。

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
The number of rows to span.
Sets the number of rows spanned by the child control.
Row spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably taller than its peers.
trans-unit.target: 跨越資料列通常很有用，遠高於其對等控制項的定位。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `RowSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫`RowSpan`面板在設計階段加入它的子控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A> methods to set the width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A>方法來設定寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is less than 1.
The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to receive the extender properties.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider.CanExtend(System.Object)" />.
<see langword="true" /> if this object can provide extender properties to the specified object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。
